name: 1-1 Big Bob-omb on the Summit
notes: Go to the mountaintop and talk to Big Bob-omb. Get behind him, pick him up and throw him onto the mountaintop three times. If you throw him off the mountain, he'll jump back up and scold you.

name: 1-2 Footrace with Koopa the Quick
notes: Talk to Koopa the Quick at the beginning, and he will challenge you to a race to where the Big Bob-omb was. Even though he takes a shortcut that Mario cannot, he will reach the top in a little over 1'30"00. Mario can run the race in about a minute, or use the flowerbed and cave warp zones for a 46-second finishing time. If you use the cannons at all, KtQ will say you cheated and you won't get the Star.

name: 1-3 Shoot to the Island in the Sky
notes: If you haven't already opened the cannons, do it now. Head past the first bridge, to the cannon in the gray half-pyramid. Line up the crosshairs with the corner of the floating island that is sticking out towards you, aim high, and fire! The Star is in the Yellow [!] Box on the island.

name: 1-4 Find the Eight Red Coins
notes: Get all 8 Red Coins. This should be fairly easy... don't forget the one on the floating island.

name: 1-5 Mario Wings to the Sky
notes: You need the Wing Cap to get this Star. Get on the floating island, and then get the Wing Cap there. Jump into the cannon, and aim for the coin in the middle of the circle of coins. When you shoot out of the cannon, don't steer Mario at all; a wind gust will push Mario into all five "special" coins.

name: 1-6 Behind Chain Chomp's Gate
notes: Three butt-stomps on Chain Chomp's wooden post will set him free. Before he hops off, he breaks open the cage, freeing the star.

name: 2-1 Chip Off Whomp's Block
notes: Climb to the top of the fortress to find the Whomp King. Stand in front of him and he'll try to fall on you. When he's flat on his face, butt-stomp his back. Three stomps will beat him, but try to stay on the top! If you go down too far off the edge, or you'll have to start the battle over.

name: 2-2 To the Top of the Fortress
notes: A tower has appeared where the Whomp King was. Make your way up the tower to find the Star.

name: 2-3 Shoot into the Wild Blue
notes: Launch yourself out of the cannon to the platform underneath the pole. Climb down the pole to the Star.

name: 2-4 Red Coins on the Floating Isle
notes: Get all 8 Red Coins. They are all easily accessible except for one above the second Thwomp.

name: 2-5 Fall onto the Caged Island
notes: Jump in the tree next to the starting point to find Hoot the Owl. Grab on and fly with him up and to the right. You'll see a small, caged floating platform containing the Star. Release your grip on Hoot and fall into the platform, or you can use the cannon to launch yourself into it.

name: 2-6 Blast Away the Wall
notes: While in the cannon, you'll see a corner sticking out, then some coins, and another corner. Launch yourself into the second corner, and it will break off, revealing the Star. Depending on your shot, you may have to go back up to get the Star.

name: 3-1 Plunder in the Sunken Ship
notes: Wait until the giant eel swims out of the ship, then swim into the ship where he was and unlock the 4 chests. The correct order is: chest farthest from you, chest on your right, chest closest to you, and chest on your left.

name: 3-2 Can the Eel Come out to Play?
notes: Swim next to the giant eel again. He will swim out; the star is on his tail.

name: 3-3 Treasure in the Ocean Cave
notes: Swim through the tunnel near the ship. You will surface in a cave. Open the 4 chests. The correct order is: chest farthest from you, chest on your left, chest on your right, chest closest to you.

name: 3-4 Red Coins on the Ship Afloat
3-5 Blast to the Stone Pillar
notes: Launch yourself out of the cannon onto the leftmost spike that extends out of the water. You have to hit the top of the spike, or Mario will slide down. Climb to the top of the spike and jump onto the ledge with the star.

name: 3-6 Through the Jet Stream
notes: Get the Metal Cap and jump off the ledge into the water. Quickly run to the star underwater in the jet stream.
